data.title: Greek resistance against the Ottoman invasion. [Archive]
data.meta_description:
The purpose of this thread is to discuss about the invasion of Greece from Ottoman Empire and to an possibile resistance of greek people against this invasion. In Wikipedia, the only information avaliabile is this: 
 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ottoman_Greece#Expansion 
Expansion 
After the fall of Constantinople to the Ottomans in 1453, the Despotate of the Morea was the last remnant of the Byzantine Empire to hold out against the Ottomans. However, this, too, fell to the Ottomans in 1460,
